verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei to the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel תֹּאמַר֒ <S%H559><s%> to-Mar Again thou shalt say אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish Whosoever אִישׁ֩ <S%H376><s%> 'ish man מִבְּנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> mib-be-Nei [he be] of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- any הַגֵּ֣ר׀ <S%H1616><s%> hag-Ger or of the strangers הַגָּ֣ר <S%H1481><s%> hag-Gar that sojourn בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El, in Israel אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יִתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten that giveth מִזַּרְע֛וֹ <S%H2233><s%> miz-zar-'O [any] of his seed לַמֹּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4432><s%> lam-Mo-lech unto Molech מ֣וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot he shall surely יוּמָ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat; be put to death עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am the people הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of the land יִרְגְּמֻ֥הוּ <S%H7275><s%> yir-ge-Mu-hu shall stone בָאָֽבֶן׃ <S%H68><s%> va-'A-ven. him with stones

וַאֲנִ֞י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I אֶתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> 'et-Ten And I will set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פָּנַי֙ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nai my face בָּאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ba-'Ish against that man הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, he וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <S%H3772><s%> ve-hich-rat-Ti and will cut him off אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To מִקֶּ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> mik-Ke-rev from among עַמּ֑וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo; his people כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki because מִזַּרְעוֹ֙ <S%H2233><s%> miz-zar-'O of his seed נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan because he hath given לַמֹּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4432><s%> lam-Mo-lech, unto Molech לְמַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an, so טַמֵּא֙ <S%H2930><s%> tam-Me to defile אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִקְדָּשִׁ֔י <S%H4720><s%> mik-da-Shi, my sanctuary וּלְחַלֵּ֖ל <S%H2490><s%> u-le-chal-Lel and to profane אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> shem name קָדְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H6944><s%> kod-shi my holy

וְאִ֡ם <S%H518><s%> ve-'Im If הַעְלֵ֣ם <S%H5956><s%> ha'-Lem do any ways יַעְלִימֽוּ֩ <S%H5956><s%> ya'-li-Mu hide עַ֨ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am And if the people הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of the land אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֵֽינֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-nei-Hem their eyes מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- any הָאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish from the man הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, he בְּתִתּ֥וֹ <S%H5414><s%> be-tit-To when he giveth מִזַּרְע֖וֹ <S%H2233><s%> miz-zar-'O of his seed לַמֹּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4432><s%> lam-Mo-lech; unto Molech לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti him not הָמִ֥ית <S%H4191><s%> ha-Mit and kill אֹתֽוֹ׃ <S%H853><s%> o-To.

וְשַׂמְתִּ֨י <S%H7760><s%> ve-sam-Ti Then I will set אֲנִ֧י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni Myself אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פָּנַ֛י <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nai my face בָּאִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ba-'Ish against that man הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu he וּבְמִשְׁפַּחְתּ֑וֹ <S%H4940><s%> u-ve-mish-pach-To; and against his family וְהִכְרַתִּ֨י <S%H3772><s%> ve-hich-rat-Ti and will cut him off אֹת֜וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To וְאֵ֣ת׀ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all הַזֹּנִ֣ים <S%H2181><s%> haz-zo-Nim and all that go a whoring אַחֲרָ֗יו <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rav, after לִזְנ֛וֹת <S%H2181><s%> liz-Not him to commit whoredom אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after הַמֹּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4432><s%> ham-Mo-lech with Molech מִקֶּ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> mik-Ke-rev from among עַמָּֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mam. their people

וְהַנֶּ֗פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> ve-han-Ne-fesh, And the soul אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who תִּפְנֶ֤ה <S%H6437><s%> tif-Neh that turneth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- after הָֽאֹבֹת֙ <S%H178><s%> ha-'o-Vot such as have familiar spirits וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to הַיִּדְּעֹנִ֔ים <S%H3049><s%> hai-yid-de-'o-Nim, wizards לִזְנ֖וֹת <S%H2181><s%> liz-Not to go a whoring אַחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei-Hem; and after וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti them I will even set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פָּנַי֙ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nai my face בַּנֶּ֣פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> ban-Ne-fesh against that soul הַהִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv, he וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <S%H3772><s%> ve-hich-rat-Ti and will cut him off אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To מִקֶּ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> mik-Ke-rev from among עַמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo. his people

וְהִ֨תְקַדִּשְׁתֶּ֔ם <S%H6942><s%> ve-Hit-kad-dish-Tem, Sanctify וִהְיִיתֶ֖ם <S%H1961><s%> vih-yi-Tem and be ye קְדֹשִׁ֑ים <S%H6918><s%> ke-do-Shim; yourselves therefore and be ye holy כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Chem. your God

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּם֙ <S%H8104><s%> u-she-mar-Tem And ye shall keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חֻקֹּתַ֔י <S%H2708><s%> chuk-ko-Tai, my statutes וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <S%H6213><s%> va-'a-si-Tem and do אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam; אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh them I [am] the LORD מְקַדִּשְׁכֶֽם׃ <S%H6942><s%> me-kad-dish-Chem. which sanctify

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- If אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish For every אִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, one אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יְקַלֵּ֧ל <S%H7043><s%> ye-kal-Lel that curseth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אָבִ֛יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv his father וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אִמּ֖וֹ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo or his mother מ֣וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot shall be surely יוּמָ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat; put to death אָבִ֧יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv his father וְאִמּ֛וֹ <S%H517><s%> ve-'im-Mo or his mother קִלֵּ֖ל <S%H7043><s%> kil-Lel he hath cursed דָּמָ֥יו <S%H1818><s%> da-Mav his blood בּֽוֹ׃ bo.

וְאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish, And the man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יִנְאַף֙ <S%H5003><s%> yin-'Af that committeth adultery אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- for אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet wife אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish, with [another] man's אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יִנְאַ֖ף <S%H5003><s%> yin-'Af [even he] that committeth adultery אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- for אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet wife רֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-hu; with his neighbour's מֽוֹת־ <S%H4191><s%> mot- shall surely יוּמַ֥ת <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat be put to death הַנֹּאֵ֖ף <S%H5003><s%> han-no-'Ef the adulterer וְהַנֹּאָֽפֶת׃ <S%H5003><s%> ve-han-no-'A-fet. and the adulteress

וְאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish, And the man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יִשְׁכַּב֙ <S%H7901><s%> yish-Kav that lieth אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- for אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> 'E-shet wife אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv, with his father's עֶרְוַ֥ת <S%H6172><s%> 'er-Vat nakedness אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv his father's גִּלָּ֑ה <S%H1540><s%> gil-Lah; hath uncovered מֽוֹת־ <S%H4191><s%> mot- of them shall surely יוּמְת֥וּ <S%H4191><s%> yu-me-Tu be put to death שְׁנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H8147><s%> she-nei-Hem both דְּמֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> de-mei-Hem their blood בָּֽם׃ Bam.

וְאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish, And if a man אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יִשְׁכַּב֙ <S%H7901><s%> yish-Kav lie אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with כַּלָּת֔וֹ <S%H3618><s%> kal-la-To, with his daughter in law מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot of them shall surely יוּמְת֖וּ <S%H4191><s%> yu-me-Tu be put to death שְׁנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H8147><s%> she-nei-Hem; both תֶּ֥בֶל <S%H8397><s%> Te-vel confusion עָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su they have wrought דְּמֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> de-mei-Hem their blood בָּֽם׃ Bam.

וְאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish, If a man אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יִשְׁכַּ֤ב <S%H7901><s%> yish-Kav also lie אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with זָכָר֙ <S%H2145><s%> za-Char with mankind מִשְׁכְּבֵ֣י <S%H4904><s%> mish-ke-Vei as he lieth אִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah, with a woman תּוֹעֵבָ֥ה <S%H8441><s%> to-'e-Vah an abomination עָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su of them have committed שְׁנֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H8147><s%> she-nei-Hem; both מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot they shall surely יוּמָ֖תוּ <S%H4191><s%> yu-Ma-tu be put to death דְּמֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> de-mei-Hem their blood בָּֽם׃ Bam.

וְאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish, And if a man אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יִקַּ֧ח <S%H3947><s%> yik-Kach take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אִשָּׁ֛ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah a wife וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אִמָּ֖הּ <S%H517><s%> 'im-Mah and her mother זִמָּ֣ה <S%H2154><s%> zim-Mah it [is] wickedness הִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> hi he בָּאֵ֞שׁ <S%H784><s%> ba-'Esh with fire יִשְׂרְפ֤וּ <S%H8313><s%> yis-re-Fu they shall be burnt אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> o-To וְאֶתְהֶ֔ן <S%H853><s%> ve-'et-Hen, וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- will be no תִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh become זִמָּ֖ה <S%H2154><s%> zim-Mah both he and they that there be no wickedness בְּתוֹכְכֶֽם׃ <S%H8432><s%> be-toch-Chem. among

וְאִ֗ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish, And if a man אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יִתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten add שְׁכָבְתּ֛וֹ <S%H7903><s%> she-cha-ve-To lie בִּבְהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> biv-he-Mah with a beast מ֣וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot he shall surely יוּמָ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat; be put to death וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> hab-be-he-Mah the beast תַּהֲרֹֽגוּ׃ <S%H2026><s%> ta-ha-Ro-gu. and ye shall slay

וְאִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> ve-'ish-Shah, And if a woman אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who תִּקְרַ֤ב <S%H7126><s%> tik-Rav approach אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- any בְּהֵמָה֙ <S%H929><s%> be-he-Mah unto any beast לְרִבְעָ֣ה <S%H7250><s%> le-riv-'Ah and lie down אֹתָ֔הּ <S%H854><s%> 'o-Tah, for וְהָרַגְתָּ֥ <S%H2026><s%> ve-ha-rag-Ta thereto thou shalt kill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah the woman וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַבְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> hab-be-he-Mah; and the beast מ֥וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot they shall surely יוּמָ֖תוּ <S%H4191><s%> yu-Ma-tu be put to death דְּמֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> de-mei-Hem their blood בָּֽם׃ Bam.

וְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish And if a man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- who יִקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> yik-Kach shall take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲחֹת֡וֹ <S%H269><s%> a-cho-To his sister בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- daughter אָבִ֣יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv his father's א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> o or בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> vat- daughter אִ֠מּוֹ <S%H517><s%> im-mo his mother's וְרָאָ֨ה <S%H7200><s%> ve-ra-'Ah and see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֶרְוָתָ֜הּ <S%H6172><s%> 'er-va-Tah her nakedness וְהִֽיא־ <S%H1931><s%> ve-hi- and she תִרְאֶ֤ה <S%H7200><s%> tir-'Eh and she see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֶרְוָתוֹ֙ <S%H6172><s%> er-va-To his nakedness חֶ֣סֶד <S%H2617><s%> Che-sed it [is] a wicked thing ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, and they וְנִ֨כְרְת֔וּ <S%H3772><s%> ve-Nich-re-Tu, and they shall be cut off לְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> le-'ei-Nei in the sight בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei of the sons עַמָּ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mam; of their people עֶרְוַ֧ת <S%H6172><s%> 'er-Vat nakedness אֲחֹת֛וֹ <S%H269><s%> a-cho-To his sister's גִּלָּ֖ה <S%H1540><s%> gil-Lah he hath uncovered עֲוֹנ֥וֹ <S%H5771><s%> a-vo-No his iniquity יִשָּֽׂא׃ <S%H5375><s%> yis-Sa. he shall bear
